contentrichtext.text: Broadcast Twelve 78 label; presumed fair use for [[Broadcast Twelve Records]] label {{Non-free use rationale |Article=Broadcast Twelve Records |Description=Broadcast Twelve 78 label, with the company logo clearly visible |Source=Scanned by [[User:Infrogmation|Infrogmation]] ([[User talk:Infrogmation|talk]]) from a 78rpm [[gramophone record]] in own collection. |Portion=Record label |Low_resolution=Yes |Purpose=To identify and illustrate Broadcast Twelve Records in the article [[Broadcast Twelve Records]] |Replaceability=No |other_information= }} == Licensing == {{Non-free fair use in|Broadcast Twelve Records|image has rationale=yes}}
